prod_short_desc: Become one with Spinjitzu Master Sensei Wu!
prod_long_desc:
Bolster your LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ gameplay with the buildable Sensei Wu Fun Pack. Place the wise and powerful ninja on the LEGO® Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then deploy his Spinjitzu skills and other special abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. Add the 3-in-1 Flying White Dragon to boost your gameplay, and rebuild it into a Golden Fire Dragon and Ultra Destruction Dragon for upgraded in-game abilities. The set includes a buildable Sensei Wu minifigure with his golden staff.
Includes a buildable Sensei Wu minifigure with his golden staff and 3-in-1 Flying White Dragon, both with a detachable LEGO® Toy Tag.
Rebuild the 3-in-1 Flying White Dragon into a Golden Fire Dragon and Ultra Destruction Dragon for upgraded in-game abilities.
Place Sensei Wu and his 3-in-1 model on the LEGO® Toy Pad and set out on exciting in-game adventures.
Activate Sensei Wu’s special Acrobat, Spinjitzu, Stealth and Pole Vault abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.
Collect your favorite LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and use them in-game together for a crazy mash-up multiverse.
Visit LEGO.com/DIMENSIONS for more information on this exciting LEGO® building and video-gaming experience. Ask your parents’ permission before going online.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ Starter Pack and internet connection required.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ expansion packs unlock additional content.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and vehicles are required to interact with LEGO DIMENSIONS video game.
Flying White Dragon measures over 1” high, 3” long and 2” wide (alternative 3-in-1 builds vary in size).
